text: @realDonaldTrump You’re pushing Testing to the States because you’re incapable of mobilizing a team to do this! JFK was able to give every person in the USA a sugar pill/vaccine for polio! Getting people tested for COVID-19 is imperative to bringing the USA back to normal! #TrumpNotResponsible
